title: SAMPEEL Womens Summer Dresses Square Neck Puff Sleeve Tie Waist Short Dress
description: Material: 100% Polyester, lightweight chiffon fabric, enough to be cool, the white lined underneath, not sheer. soft and comfortable to wear.
Features: Puff sleeve wrap dresses, square neck, womens mini short sleeve dress, above knee-length, Zipper at back, flowy ruffle hem, A line, tie waist, and the tie helps create a nice waistline.
Occasions: great for daily casual, wedding guest, birthday, party, engagement, graduation, homecoming, holiday, vacation, honeymoon, date, dinner, dinner, work, special occasions, ect.
Garment Care - Please iron the dress on a low heat setting if it is wrinkled. You can hand wash or machine wash the dress with cold water and hang it to dry. Do not bleach the dress.
Size: XS-2XL are available, please reference to the size guide on "Product description" below before ordering. Please feel free to contact us if you have any question!
